comments:
fEventListeners can be null in DebugPlugin#getEventListeners

Error
2006-02-21 15:11:11.971
An internal error occurred during: "Debug Event Dispatch".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.getEventListeners(DebugPlugin.java:801)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.access$10(DebugPlugin.java:800)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.dispatch(DebugPlugin.java:1112)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventDispatchJob.run(DebugPlugin.java:344)

Wassim, any clue on how to reproduce? Was this really 3.1?
No, but a quick Find Occurrences in DebugPlugin shows that fEventListeners can be null (ie. non-initialized).
Fixed in debug plug-in. Removed lazy init, changed null test to isEmpty().
